channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Dark Designs in Verdigris
channel.description:
In the newest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon, @Coalhada and I are taking a look at Dark Designs in Verdigris by @RichardRuane. The Expert Delve topic is "System = Story and Setting." It's a great discussion! If you have any feedback or thoughts, please share them here!
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/dark-designs-in-verdigris
![black-dragon-logo-web-800x800-72dpi|500x500](upload://yFDCGlEOsXNCgVGJcSVhoREBO8D.jpeg)
